title: NewsBreak- Twitter Slumps on Earnings, Revenue Miss
text:
NewsBreak- Twitter Slumps on Earnings, Revenue Miss

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Oct 24, 2019 07:14)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Shares of Twitter (NYSE: ) slumped 14% in premarket trading on Thursday after the social media company's third-quarter results failed to meet Wall Street expectations. The company reported revenue of $823.7 million, with earnings per share of $0.17, compared to expectations of EPS of $0.20 on $873.6 million according to Investing.com estimates. The number of monetizable daily active users for the third quarter was 145 million, compared to 124 million in the same period a year earlier.

NewsBreak- Twitter Slumps on Earnings, Revenue Miss
